column15: sum(sensi_eur) as sensi_eur from edv_susanoo.susanoo_sensi_unique_lite where stock_date = from_unixtime(unix_timestamp([KP]
column17: 'yyyy-MM-dd') and system_short_name = 'Sophis Equity' and provider = 'Sophis Equity' and closing = 'EOD Paris' and sensi_type = 'DELTA' and sensi_sub_type = 'RHO' and sensi_category = 'RATE' and sensi_transparency = '' group by stock_date
